price: Isaanis tooftaa baasani; Rabbiinis tooftaa baase. Rabbiin immoo irra caalaa warra tooftaa baasuuti.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wamakarū wamakara al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
